get.description: Fetch the details of the currently authenticated user.

put.description: Update the details (full_name, email, location) of the currently authenticated user.

post.description: Allows a logged-in user to change their own password.

schema.title: Response Read Farms Api Farms  Get
Response Get Activities For Farm Api Activities Farm  Farm Id  Get

get.description: Get the most recent activities from ALL of the user's farms.

schema.title: Response Get My Recent Activities Api Activities Me Recent Get
Response Get Soil Reports For Farm Api Soil Farm  Farm Id  Get

get.description:
Gets a summary of unique AI crop suggestions from the latest reports
for all of the user's farms.

schema.title: Response Get All Threads Api Forum Threads Get

get.description: Get a list of all possible badges in the system.

schema.title: Response Get All Available Badges Api Badges  Get

get.description: Get a list of all badges earned by the current user.

schema.title: Response Get My Earned Badges Api Badges Me Get

get.description:
Get the total count of badges earned by the current user.
(This is for the dashboard card)

post.description: TESTING ONLY: Manually award a badge to the current user by name.

get.description:
Get notifications for the current user, newest first.
By default, only fetches unread notifications.

schema.title: Response Get My Notifications Api Notifications  Get

get.description: Get the count of unread notifications for the current user.

schema.title: Response Get Unread Notification Count Api Notifications Unread Count Get

post.description: Mark a specific notification as read.
Mark all unread notifications for the current user as read.
